My Work

Some of my favorite projects:

Hatchways: Project Interview

Real-world job simulation project working on a React & Node JS chat app. Bug-fixes, Material UI design, and implementing a cloud-based image uploading feature.

Youtube Video | Hatchways

Collab Lab: Smart Shopping List

React, Firebase, & Tailwind smart shopping list app that learns your buying habits. I helped build this with three other talented developers at The Collab Lab.

Live Site | Github

Solstice Food Photography

Portfolio & landing page for Solstice Food Photography. JavaScript image gallery lightbox. Styled with Sass. Fully responsive site, including a responsive menu.

Live Site

Weather

JavaScript weather app. Uses the Open Weather API. Integrates a serverless function via Netlify for secure use of the API key. Uses browser local storage to save location.

Live Site | Github

Frontend Mentor Projects

I have solved a number of projects on the platform called Frontend Mentor. Check out my work and compare it to the original design specs!

My Frontend Mentor Profile

Dave Cesana

Landing page for Dave Cesana, Integral Life Coach. Fully responsive site, including a JavaScript animated menu. I also created all photography for the site.

Live Site

Other projects:

CK Blues

Harvard CS50 Web capstone project. Django web app that helps guitar players improve their playing guitar.

Youtube Video | Github

Loan Calculator

JavaScript web app that helps estimate monthly payments, total payment, and total interest on a loan.

Live Site | Github

Etch-A-Sketch

JavaScript sketch-pad web app based on the classic mechanical drawing toy called the Etch-A-Sketch.

Live Site | Github

Task Tracker

React JS app that utilizes components, props, and the useState hook.

Live Site | Github

Network

Django web app. Twitter-like social network website for making posts, liking posts, and following users.

Youtube Video | Github

Commerce

Django web app. eBay-like auction site. Post listings, place bids, and leave comments. Add listings to a watch-list.

Youtube video | Github
